an4.188:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati gijjhakute pabbate.
an4.188:1.2: Atha kho upako mandikaputto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho upako mandikaputto bhagavantam etadavoca:
an4.188:2.2: ‘yo koci paruparambham vatteti, paruparambham vattento sabbo so na upapadeti.
an4.188:2.4: “Paruparambhance, upaka, vatteti paruparambham vattento na upapadeti, anupapadento garayho hoti upavajjo.
an4.188:2.5: Tvam kho, upaka, paruparambham vattesi, paruparambham vattento na upapadesi, anupapadento garayho hosi upavajjo”ti.
an4.188:2.7: evamevam kho aham, bhante, ummujjamanakoyeva bhagavata mahata vadapasena baddho”ti.
an4.188:3.2: Tattha aparimana pada aparimana byanjana aparimana tathagatassa dhammadesana—
an4.188:3.4: Tam kho panidam akusalam pahatabbanti kho, upaka, maya pannattam.
an4.188:3.5: Tattha aparimana pada aparimana byanjana aparimana tathagatassa dhammadesana—
an4.188:4.1: Idam kusalanti kho, upaka, maya pannattam.
an4.188:4.2: Tattha aparimana pada aparimana byanjana aparimana tathagatassa dhammadesana—
an4.188:4.4: Tam kho panidam kusalam bhavetabbanti kho, upaka, maya pannattam.
an4.188:4.5: Tattha aparimana pada aparimana byanjana aparimana tathagatassa dhammadesana—
an4.188:5.1: Atha kho upako mandikaputto bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva yena raja magadho ajatasattu vedehiputto tenupasankami; upasankamitva yavatako ahosi bhagavata saddhim kathasallapo tam sabbam ranno magadhassa ajatasattussa vedehiputtassa arocesi.
an4.188:5.2: Evam vutte, raja magadho ajatasattu vedehiputto kupito anattamano upakam mandikaputtam etadavoca:
an4.188:5.3: “yava dhamsi vatayam lonakaradarako yava mukharo yava pagabbo yatra hi nama tam bhagavantam arahantam sammasambuddham asadetabbam mannissati;
an4.188:5.4: apehi tvam, upaka, vinassa, ma tam addasan”ti.
